remarks: Two lattice lines in a lattice plane always meet.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Jul-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
2llnm3.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
2llnm3.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
2llnm3.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
2llnm3.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
2llnm3.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
2llnm3N $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. N /\ Y e. N /\ W e. P ) /\ ( X .<_ W /\ Y .<_ W ) ) -> ( X ./\ Y ) =/= .0. ) $.
